705376f-a.text:
Lafayette Avenue, north side, between Throop and Sumner Avenues, showing Public School No. 25.

Board of Education of the City of New York

March 3, 1931
705376f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Throop Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

705375f-b.text: Lafayette Avenue, east from Throop Avenue. A short way off is Public School No. 25. View 2 shows the north side of the avenue. August 26, 1941. P. L. Sperr.
